faq1Title: How do I book a consultation?
faq1Content: You can easily book a consultation from the 'Appointments' section on our homepage. Simply select your preferred lawyer and time slot, fill in the required information, and you're all set.
faq2Title: How can I cancel or reschedule an appointment?
faq2Content: Log in to your account, go to 'Appointment History', select the relevant appointment, and click the 'Change' or 'Cancel' button. Cancellations made 24 hours before the scheduled time are free of charge.
faq3Content: Yes, all consultation contents are protected under strict confidentiality. All communications on the platform are encrypted, and we take the utmost care to protect your personal information.
faq4Title: How do I register as a lawyer on the platform?
faq4Content: You can apply for registration from the 'For Lawyers' section. Submit your qualification information and required documents, and registration will be completed after review.
faq5Title: What languages can I consult in?
faq5Content: We support Japanese and English. You can check the languages each lawyer speaks in their profile. Interpretation services can also be arranged if needed.
